attributes.additional_details: Because dog theft is rising at an alarming rate and dogs are an integral part of the family. The stress being caused to the dog and the family is totally unjust and has to be stopped.
attributes.background: Change the law to give tougher senteces for dog theft

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make dog theft a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for pet theft: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563711
